com.dooapp.gaedo.finders.root
Interface InformerFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProxyBackedInformerFactory
public interface InformerFactory

Interface allowing dynamic finding of informer associated to given bean class

Author:
ndx

Method Summary
<InformerType extends Informer<ContainedType>,ContainedType>
InformerType
get(Class<InformerType> informerClass, Class<ContainedType> containedType)
          Get an informer of a given class from the given contained type.
 

Method Detail

get

<InformerType extends Informer<ContainedType>,ContainedType> InformerType get(Class<InformerType> informerClass,
                                                                              Class<ContainedType> containedType)
Get an informer of a given class from the given contained type. If there is a way to construct such an informer, it is this class's job to do such a work

Type Parameters:
InformerType - expected informer type
ContainedType - data type
Parameters:
informerClass - expected informer type
containedType - data type
Returns:
